column5: Welcome to the Ghandi room! spacious private bedroom in a completely renovated house in the Historic East End. It is conveniently located and offers multiple amenities. Shared spaces include 1.5 Baths, Kitchen, Living area, Balcony and back yard.  Features + Full Kitchen + Hi Speed Wifi  + TV with full HD Cable + Nespresso Espresso Maker and Milk Frother  + Washer & Dryer  10 min drive from Downtown, the Medical Center and Hobby Airport.
